paper_abstract: In this paper the asymptotic property of Meyer-Konig and Zeller operators M-n for bounded functions on [0, 1] is studied. An asymptotic convergence theorem of this type approximation is established by means of some probabilistic methods and results and accurate estimate technique to the basis functions of the operators M-n. The main result of this paper subsumes the approximation of the operators M-n for functions of bounded variation as a special case.
paper_title: On the rate of approximation of Meyer-Konig and zeller operators
